#include <cstdio>
#include <cmath>
int gcd(int a,int b)
{
	if(b==0)
	return a;
	else
	return gcd(b,a%b);
}
int main()
{
	int t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		int x1,y1,x2,y2;
		scanf("%d %d %d %d",&x1,&y1,&x2,&y2);
		x1=fabs(x1-x2);
		y1=fabs(y1-y2);
		if(gcd(x1,y1)-1!=0||gcd(x1,y1)-1!=-1)
		printf("%d\n",gcd(x1,y1)-1);
		else
		printf("0\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
